recipesJson.name: Valentino
recipesJson.author: ENYAWREKLAW
recipesJson.description: Chocolate Covered Strawberries perfect for an after-sex vape on valentines day with the love of your life, after a long night of great red wine, and expensive meats and cheeses.

reviews.text: I've totally forgotten to review this since it came out. Well I mixed it up for Valentine's  day again and remembered how great this is.

A nice and sweet chocolate strawberry vape. 
Tastes of freeze dried neapolitan ice cream.

This is really good as a shake and vape. Good job Wayne and another win. I have to be honest... I haven't been much of a fan lately but you have renewed my confidence. A perfectly balanced strawberry chocolate and not harsh at all. I had to sub FW to TPA for the cotton candy but it works well. Try this one guys.
